content: Narendra Damodardas Modi is an Indian politician who has served as the Prime Minister of India since 2014.
What is the net the pic of mountains with waterfall?

I think you're referring to the scenic image often used as a wallpaper or desktop background. That's the Pic de la Meije mountain in the Écrins National Park, France, with the Vercors Massif waterfall in the foreground.
The image is located in the Écrins National Park, France.
